alert.note: Alert for McLeod; Renville; Sibley (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 8:35PM CDT until August 28 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SIBLEY...SOUTHWESTERN MCLEOD AND EAST CENTRAL RENVILLE COUNTIES... At 835 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Buffalo Lake, or 22 miles southwest of Hutchinson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stewart and Fernando. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central Minnesota. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
